title: Waldweg
description: Girls from a nearby school start ending up dead on a forest road.

title: Johanna
description: Derrick has a good suspect for a woman's murder. But the man must give himself away or confess, otherwise there's no proof against him.

title: Stiftungsfest
description: A merry party at an inn meets a sad end when one of the girls attending the party is found naked and smothered to death in her room.

title: Mitternachtsbus
description: A young woman is found dead. There's a mentally retarded man in the town, who looks like a good suspect, because he's been known to stalk her.

title: Tod am Bahngleis
description: Three dead women have been dumped on the same railroad section during a short period of time.

title: Nur Aufregungen für Rohn
description: A student attacks and robs his neighbor, an old man who works as cash carrier, but loses something that makes his victim realize who the robber is. When the old man confronts the student, the young man panics and strangles him.

title: Madeira
description: An attractive man persuades older single ladies to emigrate to Madeira with him. After they have cancelled their accounts and brought him their money, he kills them.

title: Zeichen der Gewalt
description: Convicted for manslaughter, Günter Hausmann escapes from prison and kills a guard. The police has to find out where he's hiding.

title: Paddenberg
description: An old acquaintance recognizes Mr. Paddenberg from a World War II death camp.

title: Hoffmanns Höllenfahrt
description: Mr. Hoffman rapes and semi-accidentally kills a drunken girl whom he met on her way home. How far does he go to avoid responsibility?

title: Pfandhaus
description: A pawnshop owner deeply lusts one of his young, pretty employees.

title: Ein Koffer aus Salzburg
description: A woman, who cleans railway carriages, goes back to a train to look for her suitcase. She gets killed, and a man is seen running away.

title: Kamillas junger Freund
description: A gigolo works with a gang of burglars and tells them everything they need to know about the houses of his female lovers. When a housemaid gets shot the police is on his heels.

title: Der Tag nach dem Mord
description: A young man kills his best friend when he learns that he's in love with his girlfriend. His father tries to help him by covering all the evidence that could lead to his son.

title: Alarm auf Revier 12
description: A professional burglar gets out of jail after eight years and immediately starts a new series of crimes. When he shoots an informant the police closes in on him.

title: Tod der Kolibris
description: An Asian girl runs for her life, but doesn't quite make it. A married couple finds her dead body crammed in their car trunk, and they try to get rid of her in fear of looking guilty of drunk driving.

title: Tod des Trompeters
description: A man calls Derrick to inform him about a kidnapping. They agree to meet in a park to discuss, but when Derrick and Klein get there, the man gets shot.

title: Angst
description: A business man kills his lover girl when he learns that she's in love with another man. He persuades his fearful wife to give him an alibi. Now she suspects him to be a killer - and he knows that he is dependent on her fading loyalty.

title: Tote Vögel singen nicht
description: A dead girl is found dumped in a landfill inside a coffer.

title: Schock
description: A group of car thieves gets Derrick on their trail, when one of their members is caught in the act.

title: Kalkutta
description: Derrick inspects a case where a woman was killed in a hit and run. This leads him to tracks of foul play masqueraded behind a chic night club.

title: Kein schöner Sonntag
description: Mr. Schirmer tells his son that he has defrauded his employer, and now the audition is coming due. The son promises to help.

title: Auf eigene Faust
description: Detective Winterstein gets shot right in front of the police station. Had he finally found the trail of an international criminal organization?

title: Ein unbegreiflicher Typ
description: Mr. Koller is a man with shady acquaintances, and is involved in some suspicious business.

title: Das Bordfest
description: The staff party of a small clothing business has an unhappy ending when one of the guests disappears. The case turns out to be a murder, and Derrick has a shipload of suspects.

title: Das Superding
description: An anonymous person calls a banker and tells him there's going to be a robbery in his bank. The banker plans to meet the man, but when their appointment is almost due, the man is shot in a drive-by.

title: Risiko
description: A young woman waves a truck driver to stop. The following events turn out ugly, and Derrick gets to know about another crime the same night.

title: Pecko
description: Four boys play bicycle soccer. When one of they boys goes to retrieve the ball, he becomes eyewitness to murder.

title: Der Mann aus Portofino
description: A daring escape plan works out and a grand theft auto suspect gets free. But then the events take a surprising turn.

title: Yellow He
description: Derrick investigates a case that first seems like a robbery homicide. Then, jealousy is considered a possible motive. But is this all just a smoke screen?

title: Hals in der Schlinge
description: Heli and her brother Ingo have had a big party at home. But where is their father?

title: Eine Nacht im Oktober
description: Housemaid Rosy Kramer is found dead near her employer's house. Derrick comes to know that she has been in a nearby disco with her boyfriend, then accepted a car ride from an unknown man.

title: Offene Rechnung
description: A pensioner who lives in a facility is found shot to death on the premises. But who shot him? Derrick smells foul play because it seems that the house staff have something to hide.

roles.char: Herr Schönfeld, Leiter im Postamt Müllerstraße
Pförtner im Postamt, ehem. Kollege von Berger

title: Tod des Wucherers
description: Who killed a greedy loan shark? Derrick begins from the new widow, who doesn't seem to be worried at all.

title: Das Kuckucksei
description: Mr. Horre hears his wife's last cries of help on the phone. Derrick finds plenty of clues, but which one gets him on the right track?

title: Mord im TEE 91
description: A young man is found shot in an express train carriage. his identity is revealed quickly, as Derrick knows him already.

title: Via Bangkok
description: An orchestra returns from a successful tour in Asia. At the airport, a curious duo is already waiting for the cellist Jakob Renz.

title: Inkasso
description: Achim is planning to earn some extra change washing cars. After offering his services to a few people, one agrees. A dead man lies in the trunk of the car, and Derrick finds an interesting revolver at the scene.

title: Tote im Wald
description: A young girl's body is found in a forest. Soon it turns out that she is an English exchange student who used to ride her bicycle alone, seeking for German company to chat with.

title: Der Fotograf
description: A photographer is hit by the underground. By his side lies a camera from which the film has been violently torn out.

title: Tod eines Fans
description: A reporter believes he has a sensation at his hands, when he finds a famous pop star carrying a dead girl out of his hotel room. Even Derrick is rather convinced that the case is closed.

title: Abendfrieden
description: After twenty-some years, Jakob Stanz goes to visit his grand aunt, who now lives in the House of Peaceful Evening. There is a traffic accident the same night, but Derrick believes it is an elaborate murder.

title: Ein Hinterhalt
description: Dr. Marta Schwenn's car is involved in an accident and the driver dies. The victim, however, is a young man who borrowed the car.

title: Steins Tochter
description: A man is shot at the gate of his recently engaged girlfriend's home.

title: Klavierkonzert
description: While pianist Robert van Doom is in concert, a shooting incident takes place at his home, and the housekeeper is killed.

title: Kaffee mit Beate
description: Beate and Helga are anxious about their trial for theatre. To calm Helga's mind, Beate gives her a cognac confection. But how had the candy become laced with poison?

title: Solo für Margarete
description: The police chase a suspicious driver but fail to catch him. In the morning a woman's body is found dumped near the area where the chase started.

title: Lissas Vater
description: Georg Hassler has invited his accountant, Mr. Schröder to his home to discuss business. In the night when Schröder is leaving, three shots are fired in the dark, and Schröder is killed.

title: Der Spitzel
description: A gang of burglars enter a jewelry shop, and on their way off the scene, they shoot a civil cop. Derrick needs a rather repulsive guy's help to solve the case.

title: Die verlorenen Sekunden
description: A seamstress arrives to Mrs. Kwien's home to bring her dress, but there's no answer to the door. By the noises coming from beyond the door, there's something terribly wrong.

title: Ute und Manuela
description: An anonymous caller lures Egon "Blacky" Sebald from the disco to the parking hall. Soon Derrick is needed to find out who the caller was.

title: Abitur
description: Robert Becker's father wants his son to continue the family legacy and take up the practice after him. But first Robert must pass the abitur, and his father has got him a mentor.

title: Der L-Faktor
description: Professor Waldhoff has to rush to finish his research project, and he asks his colleague Dr. Minz to come to his home to work overtime. But at home, things are awfully wrong.

title: Anschlag auf Bruno
description: Ernst waits for his dance partner Gerda in vain. She is found strangled, and the first suspect is her childhood friend, Bruno.

title: Schubachs Rückkehr
description: Willi Schubach has been behaving well and gets out of the prison early. Someone, however, has reason to wish he stayed behind the bars.

title: Ein unheimliches Haus
description: A doctor has reason to believe that his elderly patient didn't die naturally. Derrick agrees.

title: Die Puppe
description: When the housekeeper of the Gerdes couple comes back from shopping, the lady lies dead on the bedroom floor. Someone has also left a flower bouquet.

title: Tandem
description: Ewald Bienert phones home from his favorite pub, and realizes that things at home aren't right. But what has happened at Ewald's home? Even Derrick is confused.

title: Lena
description: Wolfgang Horn is suspected for murdering his ex wife. The only person who can prove his innocence is the murdered woman's deaf-muted sister Lena.

title: Besuch aus New York
description: A woman who barely survives a traffic incident tells Derrick about a strange car that caused the crash.

title: Ein Kongreß in Berlin
description: In a burglary to a laboratory, a secret research report disappears and a guard gets killed. Derrick has a hunch that the crime is connected to a congress in West Berlin.

title: Das dritte Opfer
description: Derrick goes on vacation to Upper Bavaria, but recreation is cut short when a new acquaintance, Albert Grosser, gets into trouble.

title: Die Versuchung
description: The police gets informed about a businessman, who has been kidnapped. A ransom of a million Deutschmark in small bills is requested and delivered.

title: Ein Todesengel
description: Arthur Tobbe is shot on the street and gets wounded. But who was the shooter, and what is the role of the unknown lady who was with Tobbe?

title: Karo As
description: An elderly lady is injured in a shooting incident. It would seem that the shooter only tried to scare her.

title: Hanna, liebe Hanna
description: Magda Klein waits in vain for her father at the railway station. She then goes to the hotel he was living at, but he isn't there either. After getting a strange phone call, Magda reports her father missing. Meanwhile, a shady man walks the hotel corridors.

title: Unstillbarer Hunger
description: When leaving her favorite bar, Helga Wichmann is hit by a car and killed. The bad news don't seem to shock her family, especially not the newly widowed husband.

title: Ein Lied aus Theben
description: Hans Machnow and Ulrich Hemp have a quarrel over a girl. Later in the night, Mrs. Machnow finds her son dead by the side of his car.

title: Tödliche Sekunden
description: When Achim rides his motorbike home from his girlfriend's, he drops the spare helmet. When he goes back to collect it, he hears cries for help, and is taken to a shop where a dead man lies on the floor.

title: Ein tödlicher Preis
description: Two dubious men disembark the Istanbul train. Being followed by the station guard and police, they quickly hide their suitcase in the trunk of a cab.

title: Die Entscheidung
description: Alf Hauff avoids a murder attempt by sheer luck. But does someone want the new boss of a family business dead? Alf's stepbrother's babbles confuse Derrick even more.

title: Der Tod sucht Abonnenten
description: Derrick witnesses and aborts an attempted abduction of a young lady. When he calls for help, she absconds with mad abandon.

title: Auf einem Gutshof
description: Marlene is scared of the raging thunderstorm. When she looks out a window, the glass breaks. It wasn't the thunder but a gunshot, and Marlene thinks she knows the shooter.

title: Zeuge Yurowski
description: A big corporation had its safe broken in and the guard was killed. The case had an eye witness, but his testimony isn't of much help.

title: Eine unheimlich starke Persönlichkeit
description: Robert Renz is shot at midnight in front of his lover's home.

title: Pricker
description: A prisoner bus is ambushed and the driver and warden are killed. Alfred Pricker escapes.

title: Dem Mörder eine Kerze
description: A priest is called up at 11 PM. A man wants to confess a killing.

title: Eine Rechnung geht nicht auf
description: The Hofstetter couple are driving home from a party, but a fateful accident occurs. Derrick doesn't think it was purely accidental for long.

title: Der Kanal
description: An empty car blocks a narrow bridge over a canal and the police look for the driver. He is found dead in the canal.

title: Am Abgrund
description: A call-girl is found stabbed to death, and an eye witness' testimony leads Derrick to speak to an alcoholistic, retired teacher.

title: Kein Garten Eden
description: Derrick is visited by a young man who's stepfather has been getting anonymous death threats. Lo and behold, soon the stepfather is found shot.

title: Eine ganz alte Geschichte
description: In 1946, a goldsmith was murdered. Now, over 30 years later, his nephew comes to the police claiming to know the murderer.

title: Die Schwester
description: An office building is burglarized and the nigh guard is killed. One of the three perpetrators manages to escape, but who gave him a hiding place?

title: Tod eines Italieners
description: Derrick and Klein go to a new Italian restaurant. The employees seem somewhat troubled, and Derrick has a hunch there are problems coming up.

title: Das sechste Streichholz
description: The owner of a disco is shot and a cab driver calls the cops. The victim's brother says to Derrick that he knows the murderer.

title: Prozente
description: A loan company's accountant is shot, and he dies soon after. Derrick interrogates people who heard the shots, but did someone also see the shooter?

title: Der Untermieter
description: Mr. Buschmann is released on parole after serving ten years for manslaughter.

title: Tod im See
description: A yacht keels over and the owner is barely salvaged. His wife, however, is nowhere to be found.

title: Eine Rose im Müll
description: A young lady stops a truck and gets a lift. They stop at an inn, but after that, things get strange.

title: Eine Falle für Derrick
description: Derrick gets a phone call late at night. An anonymous lady wants to testify in a case.

title: Nachts in einem fremden Haus
description: The Stettner couple is going home from a party. They have a flat tyre and decide to visit a nearby house for help. They find a dead man in the house, and get the cops. But while they are away, the corpse vanishes.

title: Die Fahrt nach Lindau
description: A stockbroker plans to drive to Lindau, but he never gets there. The scorched remains of his car and himself are found off-road. The police suspect that it wasn't an accident, and the widow tells them he had been getting threatening calls lately.

title: Ein Fall für Harry
description: Mr. Gruga wakes up in the night into the noise of someone breaking into his house. He alerts his house servant Mr. Bennecke, who goes after the burglars. Seconds later Mr. Bennecke lies dead in the yard and the silverware is missing.

title: Das Alibi
description: On his way home at night, Harry Klein sees a scared and confused girl. He escorts her home and asks if she needs a doctor or any other help, but she refuses. In the morning Harry goes back to check on her, but when the landlady lets him in, they have a gruesome surprise.

title: Hausmusik
description: Berthold Dettmers answers his phone and leaves his home. Out in the street, he is run over by a car that speeds off the scene right away.

title: Der Mann aus Kiel
description: Mr. Waginger moves from Kiel to München and gets employed as a gardener and car driver for the Korin family. Everything starts out nice but then there is a murder.

title: Ein unheimliches Erlebnis
description: Anita Schneider leaves a party early and Mr. Hohner offers her a ride home. But the trip fails to follow the original plan.

title: Via Genua
description: A corpse is crammed in a laundry cart at a hotel. The victim's business partner tells Derrick that his friend was waiting for an old acquaintance.

title: Die Tote in der Isar
description: A diver brings a dead girl to the bank of Isar.

title: Geheimnisse einer Nacht
description: Dr. Albert Vrings is shot in his bedroom. But by whom, and why?

title: Der Täter schickte Blumen
description: A cab driver goes to pick up a passenger and visits his apartment. Someone rings the door bell and then fires a gun through the door, injuring the driver.

title: Die kleine Ahrens
description: A man is found hung to death in an abandoned factory. Suicide is out of question.

title: Tödliches Rendezvous
description: A bank robbery happens right under Derrick's nose. One of the customers tries to stop the robber, but he gets injured and the robber barely manages to escape.

title: Lohmanns innerer Frieden
description: A man, sentenced for life for a goldsmith's murder, is released after 15 years. The cop who arrested him back in the day, is bothered by a hunch that this may not be the guilty man after all.

title: Attentat auf Derrick
description: Derrick is shot and seriously injured in a drive-by.

title: Die Schrecken der Nacht
description: Derrick is making good recovery of his wounds, but he can't return to work yet. Meanwhile, Harry is asked to help an older cop in his investigation. Several girls have been murdered in a small neighborhood, but no progress has been made, so the police finally decide to use a decoy.

title: Dr. Römer und der Mann des Jahres
description: Dr. Winter is shot in his laboratory. Some of his coworkers say they saw Dr. Römer enter the building the night. However, Dr. Römer has been dead for three months.

title: Das Mädchen in Jeans
description: Alwin Hauff, an automotive mechanic, is found dead in his apartment. In his death throes, he was barely able to alert his neighbor.

title: Die Verführung
description: Erich, a cop's son, has found himself a couple friends. His company talks him into dubious activities, and soon he finds himself in the middle of a murder case.

title: Manuels Pflegerin
description: Dr. Rohm invites Dr. Masilke to visit him for a few weeks. But on the first night already, their meeting is canceled due to force majeure.

title: Drei atemlose Tage
description: Two unemployed boys walk the streets looking for fun. They meet girls from another town, and decide to take them for a ride. Only they have no car, but decide to borrow one.

title: Tödlicher Ausweg
description: Mr. Hauser wants to marry his young girlfriend, but his wife would not agree to divorce. One night, the problem is solved in a gruesome way.

title: Keine schöne Fahrt nach Rom
description: Sabine and Martin are going to have a trip to Rome. They decide take a lift on a freight truck, but the outcome is far from desirable.

title: Ein Spiel mit dem Tod
description: A burglar enters a home and starts working on the safe. The alarm goes off and he flees. The next morning paper has an interesting story: The house owner has been murdered.

title: Ein Mörder zu wenig
description: Walter Kramer has been absent from work for three days and his boss gets worried.

title: Angriff aus dem Dunkel
description: Ute Reiner's friend Conny is hit by a car. She is seriously injured, and declared dead on arrival at the hospital.

title: Ende einer Sehnsucht
description: A 32 year old man is found dead in a pension home. Police Officer Merck was going to visit the guy, planning to help a good friend of his daughter's. What on earth had happened?

title: Gangster haben andere Spielregeln
description: Important papers are stolen from professor Balthaus's study. Some time later his assistant is found murdered in a parking hall.

title: Das seltsame Leben des Herrn Richter
description: Martin Richter calls his son and plans a meeting with him. It's about life and death. Sure enough, Martin is shot soon after they meet.

title: Der Klassenbeste
description: Derrick investigates a hit and run case, the secondary effects of which tend to turn from bad to worse.

title: Stellen Sie sich vor, man hat Dr. Prestel erschossen
description: Dr. Prestel, an arrogant lawyer, is shot at the door of his garage.

title: Der Mann aus Antibes
description: Patrons are leaving a concert, when there is a loud shriek. A young woman lies dead in a pavilion.

title: Gregs Trompete
description: Joachim Lutze stops at an accident scene. He is asked to transport a wounded lady to the hospital. The lady is anxious about having her luggage taken to a certain person. Joachim agrees to help, and a hell of an adventure begins.

title: Raskos Kinder
description: Albert Rasko, a money courier, is robbed and stabbed to death.

title: Toter Goldfisch
description: Julia Stettner seeks company by a newspaper posting. A much younger man responds and they meet. A few dates later a murder goes down in his apartment.

title: Wer erschoß Asmy?
description: Robert Asmy is shot in front of his sauna, right before the eyes of his girlfriend. By his reputation, former girlfriends or their previous boyfriends might be good suspects.

title: Das tödliche Schweigen
description: Helga Södern calls Derrick to inform that some men have followed her home, and she is really scared about it. However, when Derrick and Harry go to check on her, everything seems fine.

title: Ein unheimlicher Abgang
description: Rudolf Diebolz's wife finds her husband's suicide note. Soon his boat explodes on the lake. Eventually a corpse is found and recognized, but Derrick thinks not everything is right.

title: Schwester Hilde
description: Kusich, a Reeperbahn pimp, finds his way to Munich in search for a former employee. He surely finds her, but the next morning he is found dead in his hotel room.

title: Lange Nacht für Derrick
description: Dr. Boman asks for Derrick's help. His daughter has been kidnapped, but the demanded ransom is of special nature.

title: Kranzniederlegung
description: Alfons Köhler is shot at the door of his home. One of Derrick's old acquaintances keeps messing with the investigation.

title: Tod eines jungen Mädchens
description: Margot Glogau is found dead in her own bedroom.

title: Die Tänzerin
description: The staff of a boarding school celebrate the 16th anniversary of the school. Suddenly a loud bang echoes down the corridors, and Mr. Wenk is found dead in front of a dorm room.

title: Familie im Feuer
description: Franz Weiler, a petty criminal, is shot on his way home.

title: An einem Montagmorgen
description: A bank robbery goes down on a peaceful Monday morning. A foolishly brave customer rips the mask off from one of the robbers, and is shot right after. Derrick recognizes the shooter from the surveillance tape.

title: Naujocks trauriges Ende
description: A couple arrives home on a cab. Stepping out and preparing to pay the fare, they hear three gunshots. Sales consult Alfred Naujocks lies dead on the street.

title: Geheimnis im Hochhaus
description: Erich, a drug addicted burglar, enters a presumably unoccupied apartment in search for stuff to pawn. There isn't much to be stolen, but he finds a dead young lady in the bedroom.

title: Der Augenzeuge
description: Erich Schuster borrows keys to his old employer's office so that he could use the photocopier. But on the trip he runs to a situation. The Jeweler's shop in the same building is under burglary.

title: Das absolute Ende
description: Herta Kolka has finished her guitar lesson. Shortly after she has left, her teacher hears gunshots and runs to the window to see her lie dead next to her car.

title: Der Charme der Bahamas
description: Gerhard Brosch has been defrauded in stock exchange speculation, and he has lost everything, including all property of his son and daughter.

title: Die Nacht, in der Ronda starb
description: Dr. Schenk has a problem. He must ask Derrick, who lives next door, to fetch some stuff from his home. He doesn't want to go himself because his wife's lover boy is there.

title: Ein eiskalter Hund
description: Jakob Lohbach, husband to a rich restaurant owner, dates one of the waitresses.

title: Der Fall Weidau
description: Something creepy is going on in the Weidau manor. Two young people are definitely murdered a couple days apart, but there's no apparent motive.

title: Schonzeit für Mörder
description: Arnold Bothe receives a severe head trauma and dies at the hospital. However he managed to drag himself to the phone and call for help.

title: Die Rolle seines Lebens
description: Martin Theimer has capped the bottle. He has decided that he is the right man for an important role in a movie. Another actor has been selected, but Martin is insistent. All of the sudden, his path to stardom is open - but at a cost.

title: Entlassen Sie diesen Mann nicht!
description: Dr. Kroll has been sentenced to an asylum for criminally insane for attempting to murder his wife. After years of therapy, his psychiatrist, Dr. Kraus is convinced that he is now mentally sane and able to live in the society again.

title: Mädchen in Angst
description: Harry interrupts an assault on a scared girl. He begins to investigate the case further on his free time, but soon finds himself in the middle of a murder case.

title: Die Dame aus Amsterdam
description: Derrick gets an urgent phone call from a former police officer now a privet detective, Albert Hufland. During this phone call the detective gets shot but is able to reveal that he had stumble into something big during a routine following job in a hotel. Hufland was following Dr. Soest, a known chemist, on behalf of the doctor's wife who believes her husband is having an affair. The wife is right. The doctor is staying at the hotel with a young Dutch call girl called Alina Bradley. Though the man is quite a lot older than the woman, the couple seem very happy. They plan for a future together unaware that the detective is following them. After Hufland's body is found at a phone booth, Derrick and Harry Klein are left puzzling as to who shot the detective. Then, when the detective's secretary is also found shot, with no evidence of the perpetrators, it is obvious to the police that these are the doings of professional criminals. Has Dr. Soest's work got something to do with the killings?

title: Anruf in der Nacht
description: A man is severely injured in a car accident, and rushed to the hospital. He asks to see a priest. When the priest comes, the dying man gives him a special task to perform. Despite the late hour, he has to make a call and go to meet someone.

title: Absoluter Wahnsinn
description: Dagmar Engler calls her brother in terror. She has locked herself in her room and someone is trying to come in and kill her.

title: Der Tote auf der Parkbank
description: A man is found shot to death and set up sitting on a park seat.

title: Die Nacht des Jaguars
description: A young lady is found strangled near a phone booth. The investigation reveals her suspicious past but also the peculiar nature of her husband's family.

title: Ein Weg in die Freiheit
description: Mr. Wilke is shot in his office. Early in the investigation it appears that he may not have been the intended target.

title: Nachtstreife
description: Hans Marx is on night patrol with a rookie cop. They have been hinted about suspicious activity and they are to look up a car near a brothel.

title: Koldaus letzte Reise
description: Martin Koldau has served 20 years and comes to Munich to seek an old flame, among other things.

title: Nur Ärger mit dem Mann aus Rom
description: Harry Klein recognizes an old acquaintance right off, after many, many years. Arthur Dribald is back in Munich.

title: Mordfall Goos
description: Mrs. Goos is shot in the arm while riding. Her husband has his own suspects for the shooter.

title: Fliegender Vogel
description: Young Bettina has served time for participating into crime that involved murder. When she is released on parole, she is put under supervision of Dr. Kordes and her family.

title: Mordträume
description: Max Binder is haunted by recurring nightmares of committing murder.

title: Eine Reihe von schönen Tagen
description: The Beerman couple see a murder through their window. But someone thinks they saw the murderer, and bribes them to silence.

title: Kein Risiko
description: A man is found shot to death in a drifting boat. His widow finds company very soon. Meanwhile, a psychologist is conducting a most peculiar research.

title: Auf Motivsuche
description: A small movie team is looking for shooting locations. Their search takes them to the wrong place.

title: Da läuft eine Riesensache
description: An unsuccessful actor gets an offer he can't afford to refuse. Genetic heritage must not keep him from succeeding.

title: Das Piräus-Abenteuer
description: Hanna, a flight attendant who is romantically involved with Harry, is gathered in a mesh with suspicious business. Harry promises to help her out.

title: Die Stimme
description: A pleasant female voice on the phone gives Dr. Lippert several warnings about upcoming murder attempts. He soon learns that the warnings aren't vain.

title: Das Ende einer Illusion
description: Erich Rieger is a wreck of a man. He has lost his wife, his life has no more meaning, and he is gambling the insurance compensation.

title: Mord inklusive
description: A drunken man calls the police. He gives derrick a name of a person to be contacted, should anything happen to him.

title: Die Mordsache Druse
description: A young man is found murdered in a phone booth. The investigation reveals that he had managed to drive his car to the booth and drag himself in to make a final call.

title: Eine Art Mord
description: Werner has been released from prison. His son, now the headmaster of a popular school, refuses to deal with him.

title: Wie kriegen wir Bodetzki?
description: A strange murder is done in the parking hall at the airport. When the police come, the three men who found the victim are gone. They are automatically suspected, but nothing is as it first seems.

title: Kisslers Mörder
description: The owner of a "sauna club" is found murdered in his car. An employee's teenage son has a history of condemning the club and especially his mother's involvement, but Derrick knows the case is seldom that simple.

title: Der zweite Mord
description: Ursula is released from juvenile criminal custody. A strange man picks her up by the road and drives her to the city. That very night she witnesses his murder.

title: Blaue Rose
description: In spite of Derrick's advice, young Mr. Hässler conducts his own investigation to find his grandmother's murderer. The only lead he has is a blue rose tattooed on the man's wrist.

title: Die Stimme des Mörders
description: A bank robber narrowly escapes after crashing his car. He hijacks another car, and ends up killing the driver and seriously injuring the passenger.

title: Rachefeldzug
description: Derrick becomes subject to murder attempts. It may be connected to the suicide of a drug dealer he put in prison.

title: Schrei in der Nacht
description: A young prostitute is found strangled in a park. The only lead left by the perpetrator is a hat lying on the ground. The scent hound leads the cops to a house where all the tenants appear a bit strange.

title: Die Kälte des Lebens
description: A pimp is found murdered in the rest room in a night club. A rookie prostitute becomes the key witness.

title: Mozart und der Tod
description: Marion and Justus, a violinist and pianist respectively, are assaulted by a gang of thugs.

title: Der kleine Gauner
description: Ali, a small time pocket picker and purse snatcher, is proposed a better paying career in breaking and entering. On his first gig he becomes involved in a sinister plan.

title: Diebachs Frau
description: Karl Diebach's wife commits adultery seemingly without grief. Karl gets a reverend to help him retrieve his wife from her lover' house.

title: Ein merkwürdiger Tag auf dem Lande
description: A motorcyclist robs a bank at gunpoint and escapes with approximately 120.000 Deutschmark.

title: Kein Ende in Wohlgefallen
description: A photograph model commits suicide after leaving her goodbye message in her brother's answering machine.

title: Tödliches Patent
description: Birgit needs a job and gets hired too. She is to make friends with the patent office director. Unknowingly she becomes an accessory to a diabolical plan.

title: Judith
description: Judith Loska, a successful pianist, is on tour in New York. Her daughter calls her in fear of death. Someone is threatening to kill her. Judith takes the first plane back but the worst has already happened.

title: Tossners Ende
description: Tossner, a greedy real-estate developer, evicts families from their homes. In one case, a young kid jumps to death from a window. His teacher takes the case personally.

title: Höllensturz
description: Mrs. Rosen takes groceries to Mr. Mallina and finds him murdered in his apartment. He was supposed to pick an old acquaintance from the railway station later that day. Meanwhile at the station, a young man is asked to carry a suitcase past the inspection.

title: Der Einzelgänger
description: Ingo and Peter are undercover cops, investigating suspicious activity in a shady bar. Peter gets hired on a gig to drive a lorry, and turns up dead a couple days later. Ingo decides to investigate the case on his own.

title: Des Menschen Feind
description: A homeless woman is found strangled to death, on a seat at the railway station. The investigators learn that she had lately received money from a fading film star.

title: Tod am Waldrand
description: A student of a dancing school is found dead in the forest on her way home. A mentally challenged man is seen with her bicycle. Meanwhile, Derrick is not in his best health and must stay aside as Harry and Willi investigate.

title: Abgründe der Gefühle
description: Mr. Lickmann, a waiter, is assaulted on his way home, not far from the restaurant. Dr. Schöne appears on the scene shortly before the police and declares Mr. Lickmann dead.

title: Der Augenblick der Wahrheit
description: Two men abduct a bank manager from his home and use him to get to the money.

title: Beziehung abgebrochen
description: Mrs. Reichel commits adultery with one of her husband's students.

title: Solo für Vier
description: Three men and a lady, who live in a pension house, have a plan to acquire money to restore some class to the rest of their lives.

title: Caprese in der Stadt
description: Boss Caprese is insistent on having his granddaughter live with him in Sicily.

title: Gefährlicher Weg durch die Nacht
description: Benno witnesses an attempted murder. The victim asks to be taken to the telephone. After finishing the call he gives his suitcase to Benno and tells him to run with it.

title: Das Penthaus
description: A young lady goes to park her car properly. On her way back up, someone strangles her in the elevator.

title: Wer bist du, Vater?
description: Arthur Hauser calls the police to report a brutal murder. Soon after that he is found in his hotel room, stabbed to death.

title: Verlorene Würde
description: The police suspects that a junkie couple has witnessed the murder of a cop.

title: Offener Fall
description: Walter Bolitz, a heavy drinker, meets an old acquaintance who has received a heap of money. He has been hired to commit murder and he wants to share some of his pay.

title: Der Tote spielt fast keine Rolle
description: Mr. Kaminski can really throw a party. One night, when he sends a lady up to his hotel suite, planning to follow her soon, there is a corpse lying in the bathroom.

title: Störungen in der Lust zu leben
description: Two men aggressively negotiate with Mr. Dustler about the sale of his restaurant.

title: Ein Tod auf dem Hinterhof
description: A young prostitute is stabbed to death in the backyard between the brothel and her favorite bar. A crime fiction author is interested in the case.

title: Der Schrei
description: Simon Krüger is released from prison after ten years. He had confessed the shooting of a man during a robbery, but he never revealed his accomplice.

title: Das Lächeln des Dr. Bloch
description: Dr. Bloch's wife commits suicide by crashing her car into a concrete pillar. Dr. Bloch thinks he knows the culprit and ranks him no higher than a murderer.

title: Isoldes tote Freunde
description: Isolde is an excellent piano student in a family of mediocre talent. But playing the piano is not the only thing she wants from her life - and apparently someone can't handle that.

title: Die Reise nach München
description: Mr. Sassner travels to Munich to look for work, but first off he finds trouble.

title: Ein seltsamer Ehrenmann
description: Mr. Krowacs has served eight years for manslaughter. Not long after release, he is approached by a man who offers him ten thousand Deutschmark for murder.

title: Mord im Treppenhaus
description: Some party people come home to find Mrs. Kollwitz lying head down in the stairs with her neck broken.

title: Die Festmenüs des Herrn Borgelt
description: Mr. Borgelt travels to Munich to meet a couple people who his daughter had been involved with.

title: Der stille Mord
description: A young girl is found dead in the Isar. She has been raped and murdered.

title: Beatrice und der Tod
description: Beatrice, a journalist, is making a series of articles about the police work.

title: Eine eiskalte Nummer
description: Two men burglarize Robert Rudger's home. They hold Robert at gunpoint and force him to acquire money for them.

title: Tage des Zorns
description: Mrs. Heckel, a cop's wife, leaves her husband with an ex-convict - whom Mr Heckel once put in prison.

title: Die Frau des Mörders
description: Mr. Sierich is convicted for murder. However, one of the witnesses from his trial confesses on his death bed. Derrick smells foul play but must prove it, or the possible perpetrator will walk.

title: Billies schöne, neue Welt
description: Billie is sent on a trip with her boyfriend, to help out dumping a girl who died from a "golden dose" of heroin.

title: Ein merkwürdiger Privatdetektiv
description: Mr. Raude sends a private detective after his wife. When visiting his client, the detective sees that the wife has been severely beaten. Soon after that, the door bell rings and Mr. Raude ends up with two bullets in his chest.

title: Kein teurer Toter
description: Johannes Berger, the arrogant and much disliked boss and owner of a sawmill, gets threat calls. One morning he is found murdered - shot in the back and sawed into pieces.

title: Ein sehr trauriger Vorgang
description: Horst's pals take him to a brothel to celebrate his birthday. Later that night they go to Albert's home. Albert makes a phone call. Soon after that the door bell rings and three shots are fired in the stairwell.

title: Mann im Regen
description: Robert Lohmann's sister is murdered in the house where she worked as the maid. The Röder brothers living in the house claim that they were at their father's apartment when the murder happened, and Mr. Röder backs their story up.

title: Langsamer Walzer
description: Inge is warned against taking the shortcut home through the park in the night, because women have been harassed there. One night she works late and dares herself with dire consequences. A Walkman is found by her side and a strange dog wanders in the area.

title: Geschlossene Wände
description: Irene, a former model, has been released from psychiatric care after withdrawing from alcohol and cocaine. The press is already swarming around her. One journalist makes a daring article about her former lover, who gets shot soon after.

title: Nach acht langen Jahren
description: Eight years ago Andreas left his family behind and vanished. He's been living in Rome and now he has come back, allegedly to reunite with his wife, daughter and son. The police have their own suspicions for his coming back.

title: Die Lebensgefährtin
description: Hilde lives together with a wealthy, divorced man, Walter. One day she returns from the grocery shop to find him dead in his bed. Heart attack is ruled out: He has been narcotized and suffocated. The family is quick to come after his mammon.

title: Die seltsame Sache Liebe
description: Doris Stein, a waitress, is found murdered in the railway yard. Her boyfriend is waiting for her to come home. A cop who has been suspended for drinking on the job keeps interfering with the investigation.

title: Zwei Tage, zwei Nächte
description: Mr. Kronau accidentally receives an apartment key intended for his son Achim. Feeling curious, he has a look in the apartment. It turns out that he and his son really could have lived without his investigation.

title: Nachtvorstellung
description: Three high school boys go to watch a night show of a violent movie. After a noisy scene with lots of gunfire, someone notices a dead man in one of the seats.

title: Melodie des Todes
description: A lady working as an escort, available for hire through a hotel's portier, is found murdered in her apartment.

title: Die Nacht mit Ariane
description: Keepers of a hostel of questionable services recruit new girls to keep the patrons happy. A chick from the old batch helps a rookie escape and ends up on the run herself.

title: Ein Objekt der Begierde
description: Karoline is very popular in the building where she takes her English lessons. But on one unlucky evening, a tenant returning home finds her at the bottom of the stairwell, strangled to death.

title: Das Thema
description: Mr. Kindermann has dinner with his secretary Mrs. Kessler in a restaurant. Suddenly he remembers he didn't lock his car, and goes to sort it out. He never returns.

title: Nachts, als sie nach Hause lief
description: Mrs. Meissner seems to prefer other men's company to her husband's, who is very calm about it, regardless of other men mocking him for it. She always comes home, though, until one dreadful night.

title: Das Plädoyer
description: Mr. Lakonda has been released from prison. He goes to meet the attorney who put him in. Although he admits that the conviction was rightful, he says the indictment was built to prop up the attorney's career rather than to serve the justice.

title: Ein sehr ehrenwerter Herr
description: A Salvation Army trumpeter tries to talk prostitutes into leaving the industry.

title: Eine Endstation
description: Old Mr. Schreiber unexpectedly recovers from severe illness and is released from the hospital to the care of his children.

title: Darf ich Ihnen meinen Mörder vorstellen?
description: At a party, Mr. Sauters makes a peculiar proposal to Derrick. They would meet later in his home and he would introduce his future murderer to Derrick.

title: Gib dem Mörder nicht die Hand
description: Gerhard Schumann returns from his long trip around Asia. His old friend Oskar Demmler, an unemployed journalist and an alcoholic, opens a can of worms.

title: Gesicht hinter der Scheibe
description: A female voice calls the emergency center. They must contact Hugo Zeller, and have him check on his daughter.

title: Der Schlüssel
description: A female voice orders Derrick to contact a Konstantin Howald, and warn him about a forthcoming murder attempt.

title: Das Floß
description: Mr. Nolte and his colleague plan a meeting with a very special girl while his wife is out. In the morning he lies dead on the floor.

title: Nachtgebete
description: Ulrike Berger is murdered in her apartment. Some time later, egyptologist Dr. Roth gets a writ from the board of guardianship, which states that he has been reported to be the father of Ulrike's 17 year old daughter Marianne.

title: Ein Mord und lauter nette Leute
Einen schönen Tag noch, Mörder
description: Bookkeeper Hans Dannhof falls off a ledge at a construction site.

title: Der Mord, der ein Irrtum war

roles.char: Chef der Polizei - der neben dem Polizeipräsidenten sitzt
